295104.「兄貴としては グレちまったお前を \n 放っておけなくてな。\n ちょいと無理:
As a brother, I couldn't leave you alone after
you went downhill. I had to push myself a
little bit to come running.

295105.「レオーネ。\n お前が始末しろ。あの 小うるさい虫は。: Leone. You'll take care of it. That noisy bug.

295106.「ああ……望むところだ。\n 兄貴といえど 容赦はしない。:
Yeah... that's what I want. I may be your
brother, but I don't give a shit.

295107.「ため込むのは お前の悪いクセだぜ レオ。\n 全力で 受け止めてやるから 本気:
Hoarding is a bad habit of yours, Leo. I'll do
my best to catch you, so come on, be serious.

295108.「覚えているぞ。お前のことは。: I remember you. I remember you.

295109.「前回は お前の実力を 侮っていた。\n 今度こそ 全力で駆除しよう。:
I underestimated your ability last time. This
time, I will do my best to exterminate you.

295110.「ンフフフフ……<heart>\n 見せてみろ！ お前のチカラを！: Nuh-uh-uh...<heart> Let me see! Your power!

295112.「完全なる ジア・クト念晶体に\n 敗北など ありえぬ……。:
The perfect Dia Kut telecrystal cannot be
defeated...

295113.「完全な生き物など 存在しない！\n あなたは 負けたんです！: No creature is perfect! You have lost!

295114.「敗れたというのか……？\n 完全な種族のはずの ジア・クトが……。:
You mean defeated...? Dia Kut, supposedly a
perfect species...

295115.「勝利以外 許されん！\n ジア・クト念晶体には！:
Nothing but victory is acceptable! Not for Dia
Kut telecrystal!

295116.「やはり 人類に福音など 存在しないのか……。:
I guess there is no gospel for mankind after
all...

295117.「援護しろ。レオーネ！\n すぐに治る！ この程度の傷など！:
Take cover. Leone! It'll heal in a minute! A
wound like this!

295119.「俺に……命令するな……。\n 不完全な まがい物風情が……！:
Don't... tell me what to do... you imperfect
imitation...!

295120.「やっと 信じられると思ったのに……\n お前達も 俺の期待を 裏切るのか！！:
Just when I thought I could finally trust you,
you fail me too!

295122.「お前は 所詮……私から切り出された\n 末端のひとかけらを 得たにすぎんッ……:
You're just a piece of the end that was cut
out of me...!

295123.「許されるものか！ お前ごとき小片が\n 偉大なる原石たる私に 逆らうなど……！:
This is unforgivable! A little piece like you,
defying me, the great gem in the rough...!

295124.「砕け散れ！！\n そして 俺の前から 永遠に消えろ！: Shatter! And be gone from my sight forever!

295128.「くだらん……人類も……ジア・クトも……。\n すべて 等しく不完全で……不要な:
Nonsense... mankind... the Dia Kut... all
equally imperfect... and unnecessary!

295129.「俺は……生まれてくるべきではなかった！\n 利用され おとしめられ……苦しむだ:
I should never have been born! I shouldn't
have had to suffer and be used and be taken
advantage of.

295130.「不完全な存在が 罪深き生を\n 貪るのを この手で止めるのだ！:
With my own hands I will stop these imperfect
beings from devouring our sinful lives!

295140.「遅いっ！\n 突っ込むと決めたなら 死ぬ気で来い！:
Too late! If you're gonna go in there, be
ready to die!

295142.「……だけど こっちが本命ですよっ！\n はあああああっ！: ...but this one is the real deal! Haaaaah!

295148.「敵は 大魔王なのだ！\n そんな体たらくで キズひとつ つけられるか！:
The enemy is the Great Demon King! You can't
even get a scratch on him like that!

295151.「先生は ぼくを 鍛えようとしているだけです。\n ぼくが 弱いから……:
He's just trying to train me. Because I'm
weak...

295152.「……剣から呪文への連携は 悪くなかった。\n 勇者として お前は どちらも使え:
The sword to spell transition wasn't bad. As a
Hero, you can use both. If you put that to
good use, you'll be a little better.

295157.「先生のその羽根飾りは 特別なモノなのですか？\n どんな時も 身につけています:
Is that a special feather ornament for you?
You wear it at all times, don't you?

295159.「ずっと 昔に……約束をしたんだ。\n 何があっても…………\n この羽根を 共:
A long time ago... we made a promise. No
matter what... we would wear these feathers
together.

295160.「そうですか……。\n その方は 先生にとって\n とても 大切な人なのですね。: I see... that person is very important to you.

295161.「さあ どうだろうな？\n お前に言われて 久しぶりに思いだした。\n 気が遠く:
I don't know. What do you think? You made me
think of something I haven't done in a long
time. It's been so long...it's mind boggling.

295162.「俺は全身全霊で アジールを鍛え\n 勇者へと 育て上げた。:
I trained Azir with all my might and brought
him up to be a Hero.

295163.「生きがいを得たことで 俺は立ち直り……\n 新しい自分の人生を 受け入れられた:
Having something to live for helped me get
back on my feet... and embrace my new life.
Those training days were... fun.

295164.「だが……やっと 手に入れた拠り所すら……\n すぐに……失われてしまったんだ…:
But... even the stronghold we had finally
received... was soon... lost.

295165.勇者アジールと 盟友レオーネの\n幻影が消え 閉ざされていた道が\n通れるように:
Hero Azir and his ally Leone's phantom
disappeared, and the road that had been closed
became passable!

295167.「先生……見てくれましたか……？\n 今度は ちゃんとできましたよ……。:
Doctor... did you see that...? This time I did
it right...

295169.「お前が 大魔王ヴァルザードを倒したんだ。: You defeated the Great Demon King Valzard.

295172.「先生の おかげです……。\n 頼りになる盟友が ずっとそばに\n いてくれたか:
Thanks to you... for being there for me all
the time, my ally...

295173.「キズにさわるから もう しゃべらなくていい。\n さあ 共に帰ろう……。:
You don't have to say another word, it'll
scratch the surface. Let's go home together...

295178.「お前がいたから……俺は もう一度\n 生きてみようと 思えたのに……。:
You were the reason I wanted to try to live
again.

295182.「勇者ひとりを救えず 無様に生き残るなんて……\n 何が 盟友だ……。:
To survive so miserably without saving a
single Hero... what an ally...

295183.「まったく……皮肉なものだな。\n 勇者を守るための 盟友だったはずなのに\n:
It's ironic, isn't it? I was supposed to be an
ally to protect Hero, only to lose him and
survive.

295184.「国に戻った俺は アジールの母\n ゼーナピアに アジール殺害の罪を着せられ\n:
When I returned to my country, Azir's mother, Zenapia, framed me for Azir's murder and executed me without allowing me to make any
defense.

295185.「ゼーナピアにとって アジールの存在は\n あまりに大きく……俺を憎むことでしか:
Azir was too much for Zenapia, and she could
only fill that void by hating me.

295186.「アジールを 大切に思っていた気持ちは\n 俺も 同じだったというのに……。: I cared for Azir as much as he cared for me...

295187.「お前は 俺の大事な弟だ。\n それは永遠に 変わることはない。:
You are my precious brother. That will never
change.

295188.「だが お前は 世界に仇なす道を選んだ。\n 何度も 引き返す機会はあったはずな:
But you chose to avenge the world. You had so
many chances to turn back, but you made your
decision.

295189.「俺は 勇者だ。\n どんなことがあっても 人々を守り\n 人々のために戦うと:
I am Hero. I've decided to protect people and
fight for them, no matter what it takes.

295190.「俺は 勇者として お前を倒す！: I will defeat you as Hero!

295192.「あいつは ずっと\n 盟友である お前のことを気にかけていた。: He has always cared about you, his ally.

295193.「この羽根飾りは あいつの形見だ。\n よければ お前が持っていてやってくれ。:
This feather ornament is his memento. You can
keep it if you like.

295194.「ううっ……！ そろそろ 限界……ですっ。: Ugh...! I'm almost at my limit....

295196.「はあーーーー……。\n ぺちゃんこになっちまう前に アンタを\n 受け止められ:
I'm glad I was able to catch you before you
got flattened...

295197.「<cs_pchero>は どうなった？\n 無事なのか？: What happened to <cs_pchero>? Are they safe?

295199.「俺たち全員 ボロボロだな。\n まったく……とっさに翼を出すチカラも\n 残っ:
We're all in shambles. We didn't even have the
strength left to take wing at a moment's
notice...

295201.「まさか……ジア・ルミナの言っていた\n ジア・クトの本隊が\n もう 到着して:
Don't tell me... that the main body of Dia Kut
that Dia Lumina was talking about has already
arrived?

295202.「おい！ すげえ数だぞ！\n こりゃさすがに ヤベェんじゃねえか！？:
Hey! There are so many! This is really bad,
isn't it!

295203.「でも やるしか ありませんっ……！\n 私たちが退いたら アストルティアの\n:
But we have to do this. If we leave, the
people of Astoltia will be harmed.

295205.「間に合ってよかった……！: Glad I made it in time...!

295206.「もう大丈夫だよ みんな。\n ここからは ボクたちに任せて。:
It's gonna be okay, guys. We'll take it from
here.

295207.「おりゃあああーーーーーっ！\n どけどけどけーーっ！\n 英雄様の お通りじゃ:
Ooohhhhhhh! Move, move, move, move! Hero
coming through!

295208.「わたくしも 負けていられません。: I am not going to be outdone.

295210.「ハクオウ！\n そなたは 左翼を頼む！: Hakuo! You, take the left wing!

295212.「すごい……英雄たちのおかげで\n 敵が押し返されていきます！:
Amazing...the enemy is being pushed back
thanks to our heroes!

295213.「へへっ！ 待ってたぜぇ お前ら！\n 寝てばっかりで 退屈だったろうし\n 思:
Heh heh! I've been waiting for you, boys! I
know you've been bored out of your minds
sleeping all night, so let's get out of here!

295214.「さ……さすがに 敵の数が多すぎるよ！\n なんとかして 裂け目を ふさがないと:
There are too many of them! We have to do
something to close the Breach...

295215.「んなこといったって どーすんだよ！\n 最後の１匹になるまで 倒すしかねーだろ:
What are you going to do? We've got to take
them down until there's only one left!

295216.<center>頼みが……あるんだ……。\n羽根飾りを 空に 掲げてくれ……。:
Do me a favor... hoist a feather ornament into
the sky...

295219.「この光が 敵を止めてくれている間に\n 一気に 押し返すぞ！:
While this light is stopping them, we'll push
them back in one fell swoop!

295221.「アストルティアは\n ボク達英雄が 守るんだっ！:
Astoltia is ours, and we heroes will protect
it!

295222.「あなたたちの好きには させませんっ！: I won't let you do what you want!

295225.「ハッハーーーン！\n アタシたちに かかれば\n こんなん 楽勝だっての！: Ha-ha-ha-ha! This is a piece of cake for us!

295226.「敵が多すぎて ちょっと ヒヤっとしたけどよ！\n <cs_pchero>のおか:
There were so many enemies, it was a little
scary! But thanks to <cs_pchero> you saved
the day!

295228.「……ありがとう レオ。\n 結局 最後には助けてくれるなんて\n お前らしいよ:
...Thanks, Leo. It's so like you to help me
out in the end.

295230.「塔の主である ジア・ルミナを倒したおかげか\n 結晶化していた人々も 元に 戻:
Thanks to the defeat of the tower's Lord, Dia
Lumina, the crystallized people seem to have
been restored to their original state.

295231.「天使長が 報告を待っているはずです。\n 戦いで受けた傷を いやす必要もありま:
The Archangel will be waiting for your report.
We need to heal our wounds from the battle, so
let's go back to Heaven.

295234.「騒がしいぞ。\n また 奴らの船が 降り立ったのか？\n それとも 敵の軍勢が:
It's noisy. Have their ships landed again? Or
is it the enemy's army pouring in?

295235.「こ 今回は もっとヤバそうなんでさぁ！\n とにかく き 来てくだせえ！:
This time it looks even worse! Anyway, come
here!

295935.「そのくらいにしろ レオーネ。\n 私が 止めなければ\n アジールは 深手を負:
That's enough, Leone. If I hadn't stopped you,
Azir would have been seriously wounded.

295944.「そんな……あの姿……。\n まるで ジア・ルミナのよう……。:
Oh no... that look... it's just like Dia
Lumina...

295946.「我こそが 人類にとっての福音……\n 勇者と ジア・クトのチカラを手に入れ\n:
I am the Gospel for mankind, the Hero, the one
who will take the power of Dia Kut and bring

295948.「確かに人間は 間違いを犯すかもしれない！\n でも それでいいじゃねえか！\n:
Sure, humans can make mistakes! But that's

295949.「アシュレイ……いつも お前はそうだった。\n 当然のように 選ばれし者の王道を:
Ashley...it's always been you. You take the high road of the chosen one as a matter of course, not even realizing you were chosen in
the first place.

295950.「その陰で 選ばれなかった者たちが\n どんな気持ちで いたのかなど \n 考え:
I wonder if they ever thought about the

295951.「俺は いつだって お前とは\n 対等だと思っていた。 \n お前は そうじゃな:
I always thought we were equals. But you

295952.「まさに 生まれながらの強者……。\n お前こそ 勇者に ふさわしい。:
A born strong man... you are a Hero worthy of
the name.

295953.「お前のそういうところが 大嫌いだったよ！\n 死ね！ アシュレイッ！！: I always hated that about you! Die! Ashley!

295956.「貴様のような 存在がいるから\n 勇者などという おごった者が 増長するのだ！:
It's because of beings like you that the
arrogant Hero is able to thrive!

295957.「盟友という立場に甘んじ\n 日の当たらぬ道を歩む 愚か者が！！:
You fools, who, having been ally's, have taken
the path that the sun never shines on!

295958.「いいだろう……！\n 貴様も 勇者と共に死ぬがいい！！: All right...! You will die with Hero!

295961.「天使の光輪よ！ 我が声に応え\n ここに 顕現せよ！:
Angel's Halo! Answer my call and be manifested

295962.<center>今こそ チカラを貸しましょう！\n私の創りだせし 光輪の上を\n:
The time has come to lend you my power!
Let the halo I've created be your battlefield!

295964.「私が光輪を維持しますから その間に\n レオーネを 倒すのです！:
I will maintain the halo, and in the meantime,
you must defeat Leone!

295965.「勇者と盟友の 忌まわしい歴史を\n 今こそ 終わらせてやる！:
The abominable history of Hero and his allies
must end now!

295967.「ははっ……。\n 本当に……兄貴らしい……。: Haha... really... that's like my brother...

295968.「ずっと小さな頃から 兄貴は\n 誰よりも 勇者だった……。:
Ever since I was a little boy, my brother has
been the bravest of all...

295969.「お前は そのままでいろよ……。\n 勇者アシュレイ……。: You stay that way Hero Ashley...

296517.「あのデカブツが……\n ジア・クトの本丸……なのか？:
Is that big thing... the main body of Dia
Kut...?

296528.「余興は 楽しんでいただけたかな？\n ゆりかごの末裔たちよ。:
I hope you enjoyed the entertainment.
Descendants of the Cradle.

296529.「余は ジア・レド・ゲノス。\n ジア・クト念晶体を統べる 万象の王。:
I am Dia Ledo Genos. King of all the elephants
who rules over the Dia Kut telecrystal.

296530.「あれが……ジア・クトの王……！: That... is the King of Dia Kut...!

296531.「そなたらと 戯れたのは\n ジア・クト全軍の ほんの ひとかけら……。:
Only a fraction of Dia Kut's entire army

296532.「あれほどの 大軍勢が……\n ほんの 一部でしかないだと……？:
So that such a large army is only a fraction

296533.「見よ！ この美しき 魔眼の月を！\n これこそが アストルティアの終焉を照らす:
Behold! This beautiful Eye of Evil! This is
the symbol of absolute domination that will

296534.「侵略は 我らの本能。\n 支配とは 我らのたしなみ。:
Aggression is our instinct. Domination is our
modus operandi.

296535.「空を見上げるたび 思いだすがいい！\n そなたらが ジア・クトにとって\n 征:
Every time you look up at the sky, remember!
That you are nothing to Dia Kut but a
conqueror!

296536.「滅浄の刻が 満ちし折……アストルティアの地は\n 新たな姿へと 生まれ変わるだ:
When the time of destruction and purification is fulfilled the land of Astoltia will be reborn in a new form! Until then, wait and
tremble...

296537.「我ら天使の故郷 とこしえのゆりかごが\n 滅んだ時も 突如として 空に禍々しい:
It is said that when the Eternal Cradle, the
home of our angels, was destroyed, the moon
suddenly rose in the sky...

296538.「ふん……我々は 今まさに 故郷と同じ危機に\n 瀕していると いうわけだ。:
Hmmm... we are in the very same crisis as back
home.

296539.「だが そう何度も ジア・クトに\n 侵略を許すつもりは 断じてない！:
But I will not allow Dia Kut to invade us
again and again!

296540.「奴らと 決戦の時も近い……。: The decisive battle with them is near...

296541.「お前たち英雄は 今や ジア・クトの大軍勢を\n 退けるほどに 強くなっている。:
You heroes are now strong enough to fend off
Dia Kut's hordes.

296542.「これからの戦いの中心と なってもらうぞ。\n もちろん 我ら天使も 総力を挙げ:
You will be at the center of the battle to
come. Of course, we angels will fight with all
our might.

296543.「さあ お前たちも 配置に戻れ。: Come on, you guys, back in position.

296544.「塔での戦いの後 あわただしくて\n お話しする機会が ありませんでしたが\n:
I know we haven't had a chance to talk in the
rush that followed the battle at the tower,
but I'm sure you noticed my halo, didn't you?

296545.「導きの天使には 英雄に足る人物を見極めるため\n 地上で活躍している 英雄の卵:
The guiding angel is charged with identifying promising heroes from the ranks of the heroic eggs on earth to see who is worthy of being a
hero.

296546.「導きの天使として 新米である私が\n 最初に見出した 英雄の卵が あなたでした:
As an angel of guidance, you were the first
heroic egg I discovered as a newbie.

296547.「私は この天星郷から\n あなたと あなたの戦いを\n ずっと 見守ってきた…:
I have been watching you and your fight all
the way from here in Heaven...

296548.「そうして 見守っているうち\n 人のために心を砕く あなたの優しさに\n いつ:
As I watched over you, I was drawn to your
kindness and your concern for others.

296549.「その想いは あなたが 冥王ネルゲルとの戦いで\n 窮地に陥った時 天使の禁を破:
It was that feeling that made you choose to break the angelic ban and intervene in the battle against Netherlord Nergel when you were
in a tight spot in the war.

296550.「地上の戦いに 天使が介入することは大罪です。\n 以来 私は 罪付きの天使と呼:
It is a mortal sin for an angel to intervene in earthly battles. Since then, I have been called an angel with sin, and for a time I was
even removed from my position as a guiding angel.

296551.「ですが 後悔は していません。\n ずっと あなたのチカラになりたいと\n 思:
But I have no regrets. I've always wanted to
help you.

296552.「……やっと 言えてよかった。\n 初めて ロンダ岬で 会った時から\n ずっと:
I'm glad I finally got to tell you. I've
wanted to tell you ever since we first met at
Rhonda Cape.

296553.「アストルティアを守るため \n 共に戦いましょう。<pc>。:
Let us fight together to protect Astoltia.
<pc>.

297210.「アジールは もう 旅立った。\n 今は ただ安らかに 眠らせてやろう。:
Azir has already left. Let's just let him rest
in peace.

302529.過去に バドリー岩石地帯に 行ったことがあれば\nバドリー岩石地帯の南へは バシ:
If you have been to the Budley Rock Zone in the past, you can fly to the south of the Budley Rock Zone from the Budley Rock Zone
Wilderness Area in Bashikko.

302582.「ああ……この先に進む前に\n もうひとつ 見てもらいたいものがある。:
Oh...there is one more thing I want you to see
before we move on.

302583.「これから お前に見せるのは\n 俺の人生で 最もつらい記憶だ。:
What I'm about to show you is the most painful
memory of my life.

302584.「どれだけ時が経っても……傷は癒えない。\n それでも このことが 俺の運命を\:
